title: Kaboodle. - Volume 1.
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Patricia Edgar and Heather Williams
brief_description: Nine animated stories: “Molly Makes Music”, “Double Take”, “The Wheelie Wonder”, “The Great Detective”, “The Great Sandwich Swap”, “The Huge Adventures of Trevor a Cat”, “Scuff the Sock”, “Marty Makes a Move” and “Wombat and Gumshoe.”
